import React from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { Layout, Monitor, Book, Award, Users, BookOpen, Code, FileCode, Coffee, ChevronRight, PieChart } from 'lucide-react'; import logo from '../assets/images/logos.png'; const Dashboard = () => { const currentProgress = { frontend: 15.5, backend: 0, database: 0 }; const currentCourse = { name: "Introduction to HTML", progress: 15.5, image: "/path/to/course-image.png", modules: [ { name: "HTML Basics", progress: 60, difficulty: "Fundamental", status: "Continue" }, { name: "HTML Structure", progress: 0, difficulty: "Fundamental", status: "Locked" }, { name: "HTML Forms", progress: 0, difficulty: "Intermediate", status: "Locked" } ] }; return (

{module.difficulty}
))}
); }; export default Dashboard;
